about.AboutName: I'm Shirley Mallea, a web developer
about.AboutShort: who loves to offer a good solution by interpreting business needs to create experiences that attract and persuade the end customer

bullets.1: Developed custom landing pages and mailings using CSS, JS, HTML, JSON, MongoDB, Liquid, and React.
bullets.2: Increased sales by 130% by migrating from OpenCart to Shopify.
